title: Minimal water heating script
description: With this minimal script, it is possible to control water heating based on spot-prices. Script works only with Shelly firmware version 1.0.0 or later.

title: Night hours only! Minimal water heating script
description: With this minimal script, you can heat cheapest hours between 22:00 - 07:00. Script works only with Shelly firmware version 1.0.0 or later.

title: Spot-price and Rank controlled relays
description: With this script it is possible to control two different relays by using price limit and cheapest hours option. Script works only with Shelly firmware version 1.0.0 or later.

title: Weather forecast adjusted Rank and Spot-price controlled relays
description: With this script, it is possible to control 1-3 relays according to the weather forecast adjusted hours. Script works only with Shelly firmware version 1.0.0 or later.

title: Monitoring script
description: This script monitors other script status and Internet connection. Re-starting scripts or rebooting Shelly when required.
